page.title: 16Nadder Middle School
page.content: This school opened in{1983}in the building of the former{Dunworth County {Secondary School.}The building was opened in{1961}as a two form entry secondary school. Following reorganisation in 1983 it became a two form entry{Middle School}with{220 children on roll. At the present moment there are 13 teachers, a secretary, 2 ancillary helpers and 3 dinnertime assistants employed here. There is also a caretaker a number of cleaners and kitchen workers and a groundsman. The school is set in beautiful surrounding overlooking farmland in most directions. A little more than half the pupils in the school travel to and from school by means of school buses. We draw children in the catchment area form a radius of ten miles.
